---
category: news
title: "Facebook cancels its 2020-2021 AI Residency program due to coronavirus"
excerpt: "Facebook today announced that it plans to cancel its 2020-2021 in-person AI Residency program as a result of the novel coronavirus pandemic. In a statement sent to VentureBeat via email, Facebook vice president of AI Jerome Pesenti said that the decision was motivated by health and safety concerns."
